#summary Automatically adjust ratings according to played count and listening pattern.
#labels ratings,tracks,auto

= Step-by-step Guide =

Start iTSfv...

 * Press F2 to access [Options]
 * Go to [OneTouch] > Library > Rating tab
 * Modify any settings to suit your needs
 * Press OK 

You are now back to the Main Window... 

 * [Jobs] menu, click Adjust track Ratings...
